name: Kitten Tower Defense
description:
A tower defense game featuring kittens facing off against waves of bird-like foes.

Created under game-jam like conditions under the theme of kittens. All functionality and sounds was created by myself while the art and animations was created by my partner Noah.

This project was created in part of the Video Game Design III courses offered at TECC-E in the LISD school district.

The game features 8 unique towers along with several different types of bird abilities. Will you collect all of the kittens?
